description: Landing page presenting key information about the company and its charging locker solutions. Includes a language switcher in the top-right corner. The web application supports English, Spanish, Catalan, French, and Portuguese.
Dynamic video section that allows the company owner to upload and manage promotional or informational videos directly through the admin panel.
Product information section displayed after the video, highlighting key features, benefits, and use cases of the charging lockers.
Interactive price calculator that allows potential customers to estimate the approximate cost of a charging locker setup based on their needs.
Contact form that enables customers to quickly get in touch with a Charge Connecting representative for inquiries or quotes.
Customer reviews section presented as a carousel slider, showcasing feedback from businesses already using Charge Connecting lockers.
Multilingual chatbot designed to answer frequently asked questions and guide visitors, improving user support and engagement.
